Trade/Device Name(s): Assure Tech hCG Pregnancy Serum/Urine Combo Test Cassette
Assure Tech hCG Pregnancy Serum/Urine Combo Test Strip
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Assure Tech hCG Pregnancy Serum/Urine Combo Test Cassette and Strip for rapid visual immunoassay detection of hCG in urine or serum to aid early pregnancy detection
Indications for Use Summary: A rapid visual immunoassay for qualitative, presumptive detection of human chorionic gonadotropin in human urine or serum specimens, intended for use as an aid in early detection of pregnancy in clinical laboratories and point-of-care settings
